mapper.select: /* operUnit.findListOperationUnit: 운영단위 목록 */ SELECT OU.TEN_ID , OU.OUNIT_CD , OU.OUNIT_NM , OU.OUNIT_NM_EN , OU.RMK , OU.STS , OU.REGR_ID , OU.REG_DTTM , OU.MODR_ID , OU.MOD_DTTM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OORG WHERE TEN_ID = OU.TEN_ID AND OUNIT_CD = OU.OUNIT_CD AND STS != 'D' ) AS USE_COUNT_OPER_ORG FROM OUNIT OU WHERE OU.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND OU.STS != 'D' ORDER BY OU.REG_DTTM

/* operUnit.findListOperationUnit: 운영단위 목록(코드성 조회) */ SELECT A.TEN_ID , A.OUNIT_CD , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN A.OUNIT_NM_EN ELSE A.OUNIT_NM END OUNIT_NM FROM OUNIT A WHERE A.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND A.STS != 'D' ORDER BY REG_DTTM
